column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Reports say an unidentified ‘foreigner’ was found lying dead on the road on Tuesday
column5: 2020 at 9:00 in Wat Vihear Borey village
column9: Phnom Penh. ------Authorities say that cause of death is unknown. The body is initially reported to be aged around 50 (*but could be younger)
column10: with dark hair and a beard. The man was dressed only in red shorts.------An examination of the body found the body had yellow skin (*jaundice?) and blisters. The body was taken to the morgue at Wat Teuk Thla.
